headline: Teradyne (TER) Announces Quarterly Dividend of US$0.12 Per Share
summary: Teradyne (TER) recently declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.12 per share, bringing attention to its commitment to shareholder returns. Over the last quarter, Teradyne's stock price increased 43%, a significant movement likely influenced by its ongoing initiatives. These include the introduction of the Magnum 7H memory tester and notable corporate governance updates, such as changes to its board directors and bylaws. In contrast to Teradyne's upward trend, the broader market experienced a...
